item.title: Stanley Tucci to Join NBC for Coverage of 2026 Winter Olympics
item.description: Tucci will cover the food, traditions and culture of northern Italy during the Milan Cortina games.

item.title: Trump Takes on L.A. Olympics: Plans to Lead Task Force on 2028 Games (Exclusive)
item.description: The president is preparing to announce a task force on the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles amid tensions between the city and the White House.
